column4: hello.  i dl ubuntu 8.04.1 and boot and it takes too much screen (only part of desktop fits on my monitor)
when I try to adjust resolution, my display starts flipping badly.  Is there a way at boot to prevent it from using any video drivers other than some standard driver?
